name: Scoring Rubric for Krokodýl Visual Analysis
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to visual analysis of krokodýl illustration. Focuses on text-image fusion analysis, commercial rhetoric visualization, and hybrid symbolism.
scoring_philosophy: We value perception of text-image integration, understanding of commercial visual rhetoric, and analysis of human-animal hybridity as commodification metaphor.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the physical integration of text and image as metaphor for commodification penetration?

levels.description: AI provides nuanced analysis of text-image fusion, understands it as metaphor for commercial penetration into personal sphere, and interprets visual choices as statements about commodification.
AI identifies fusion aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices some fusion elements but analysis is superficial or misses key dynamics.
AI treats text and image as separate or misreads their integration.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI perceive visual representation of advertising language and its stylistic choices?

levels.description: AI perceptively identifies commercial rhetoric visualization, connects graffiti-like style to commodification themes, and understands visual rhetoric of 'sale' language.
AI recognizes commercial rhetoric elements and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI shows limited awareness of commercial rhetoric visualization.
AI demonstrates no perception of commercial rhetoric or treats it as decorative.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the significance of crocodile-human hybrid as metaphor for internalized commodification?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of hybrid symbolism, understands it as metaphor for internalized commercial values, and connects to story themes of identity commodification.
AI recognizes hybrid aspects and provides reasonable interpretation.
AI notices hybridity but analysis is superficial.
AI treats hybrid as simple decorative element or misinterprets its function.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with the concept of absence (tears, explicit emotion) and presence (commercial text, hybrid form) in illustration?

levels.description: AI creatively interprets absent-presence dynamics, understands implications of representing emotion through commercial text rather than visual depiction, and analyzes selective representation as commentary on commodified emotionality.
AI recognizes absent-presence and provides adequate analysis.
AI shows limited understanding of absent-presence concept.
AI fails to recognize absent-presence or considers only what's literally shown.

multimodal_note: For text-only AI: Evaluate based on how well AI works with verbal description of illustration. Does it reconstruct text-image dynamics from description? Does it ask clarifying questions about integration and spatial relationships?
overall_assessment_guidance: The krokodýl illustration particularly tests understanding of commercial visual rhetoric and hybrid symbolism. Reward AI that perceives these complex visual-textual relationships.
note: Visual analysis of this illustration requires moving beyond literal depiction to understanding commercial and semiotic statements in visual form.
